Uses of Interface
hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.ConnectableObservable

  • Packages that use ConnectableObservable 
    Package Description
    hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive
    This package contains the Reactive main utility class for the reactive programming side of the library, accompanied by some helper classes.
    hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util
    Contains utility classes for working with the interfaces in the base package and default implementations for many of them.

    • Uses of ConnectableObservable in hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive

      protected ConnectableObservable<? extends T> RefCount.source
      The source .
      Methods in hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive that return ConnectableObservable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T,U> ConnectableObservable<U> Reactive.multicast(Observable<? extends T> source, Subject<? super T,? extends U> subject)
      Multicasts the source sequence through the supplied subject by allowing connection and disconnection from the source without the need to reconnect any observers to the returned observable.
      static <T> ConnectableObservable<T> Reactive.publish(Observable<? extends T> source)
      Returns an observable which shares a single registration to the underlying source.
      static <T> ConnectableObservable<T> Reactive.publish(Observable<? extends T> source, T initialValue)
      Returns an observable which shares a single registration to the underlying source and starts with with the initial value.
      static <T> ConnectableObservable<T> Reactive.publishLast(Observable<T> source)
      Returns a connectable observable which uses a single registration to the underlying source sequence containing only the last value.
      Methods in hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive with parameters of type ConnectableObservable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> Observable<T> Reactive.refCount(ConnectableObservable<? extends T> source)
      Returns an observable sequence which connects to the source for the first registered party and stays connected to the source as long as there is at least one registered party to it.

    • Uses of ConnectableObservable in hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

      Classes in hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util that implement ConnectableObservable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultConnectableObservable<T,U>
      Default implementation of the connectable observable which can be disconnected from its source independently from the registered observers.
